comments.html: MACSec on underlay core across the board would simplify upper layer protocols IMO, i.e. if MACSec is underlay, then you could probably skip extra work of auth config on the protocols. Just my opinion though, for doing less work than may be needed, but also simplifies stuff in an org, where you have lower level engineers who'd just mess stuff up the more complex the network gets.
comments.name: Daryll Swer
